raw_comment: Legacy is more likely to get in the Ivy League and I wonder why poorer can't get in the easier way like the rich do. ITS UNFAIR... someone from a small town could have really good test scores and still not get in or have a harder time getting in because they don't have legacies at their schools.
ace_sentences: A legacy applicant is more likely to get into an Ivy League university.
I wonder why a poorer person cannot get into an Ivy League university in an easier way.
A rich person can get into an Ivy League university in an easier way.
A person can come from a small town.
A person from a small town can have very good test scores.
A person from a small town can still not get into an Ivy League university.
A person from a small town can have a harder time getting into an Ivy League university.
This can happen because the person does not have a legacy at the school.
